title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 402.3 - Use of social services staff
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 402.3 - Use of social services staff

State Regulations
(a) The social services district may allow
the social services staff who are involved in the supervision and operation of
the social services program to perform not only those functions relating to the
provision of social services, but also other functions relating to the
provision of income maintenance. (b) In the case where staff is engaged in
both services and income maintenance functions, an appropriate cost allocation
method shall be used for reimbursement purpose as prescribed by the
department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
402.3

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
